statements: SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date = '2021-01-01';
SELECT close_price, stock_symbol, high_price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT high_price, low_price, stock_symbol FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date < '2021-01-10';
SELECT open_price, close_price, stock_symbol FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date > '2021-02-15';
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price, open_price FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT stock_symbol, high_price, low_price FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date = '2022-01-02'
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, high_price FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 100
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price_date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE open_price < 50 ORDER BY close_price ASC
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT stock_name, sector FROM stocks WHERE sector='Technology';
SELECT stock_name, company_name FROM stocks ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT stock_name, price FROM stocks JOIN transactions ON stocks.stock_id = transactions.stock_id WHERE transaction_type='Buy';
SELECT stock_id, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY stock_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, quantity, price FROM transactions WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT stock_id, AVG(close_price) AS average_close_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_id HAVING AVG(close_price) > 50 ORDER BY average_close_price DESC;
SELECT stock_id, MAX(high_price) AS highest_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY stock_id ORDER BY highest_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirms;
SELECT firm_name, firm_type FROM InvestmentFirms WHERE firm_type = 'Hedge Fund';
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE price > 100;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, date FROM StockPrices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT analysis_results FROM StockAnalysis WHERE analysis_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT firm_name, firm_type FROM InvestmentFirms;
SELECT analysis_results FROM StockAnalysis WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, date FROM StockPrices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT StockPrices.price, InvestmentFirms.firm_name FROM StockPrices INNER JOIN InvestmentFirms ON StockPrices.stock_id = InvestmentFirms.firm_id;
SELECT firm_name FROM investment_firms;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_price_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM stock_history ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT analysis_result, date FROM analysis_results WHERE stock_id = 1001;
SELECT firm_name, firm_id FROM investment_firms WHERE firm_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM investment_firms WHERE firm_id = 100;
SELECT firm_name FROM investment_firms WHERE firm_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_price_data WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM stock_price_data;
SELECT stock_symbol, analysis_result FROM stock_price_data INNER JOIN analysis_results ON stock_price_data.stock_id = analysis_results.stock_id;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM StockDetails ORDER BY stock_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sector FROM StockDetails;
SELECT stock_name, sector, stock_symbol FROM StockDetails JOIN StockPrices ON StockDetails.stock_name = StockPrices.stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT stock_name, sector FROM StockDetails ORDER BY sector DESC
SELECT firm_name, location FROM FirmInvestments WHERE total_assets > 1000000
SELECT employee_name, role, department, salary FROM InvestmentEmployees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT portfolio_id, stock_id, quantity, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC
